pkgmetadata.longdescription: ### Python version >= 3.6## Common code for myself.## Features:- AppTool class - Combine config & config_local & config_test (if --test) - Act as dict to get config by key (connected by dot), it can be overrited by ENV variable - logger helper (pre-configged email handler) - Pre-configged SMTP email client - @log annotation.- Utility functions - email helper - load & dump json - @benchmark annotation - OS detector - @deprecated annotation - get home dir - deep merge - Get windows folders - string alignment for Chinese - get dict value by key (connected by dot) - now, today - random_sleep- GetCh class - input value for multiple platforms## TODO:- send_email support CC.
